messages.content:
Dear friend,
For too many people, things aren't working as they should be.
Both the Conservatives and Labour are stuck in the past, failing time and again to deliver a better future.
It doesn't have to be this way. We have ambitious plans for the future of our country, where every person, every community, and our planet are thriving.
A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit and build a brighter future.
Please use your vote on 12th December to vote Liberal Democrat and build a brighter future.
Best wishes,
Jo Swinson
P.S. Find out more about my Plan for the Future at LibDems.org.uk/plan

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A pledge to tackle the climate emergency.
Plans to build a fairer economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A focus on giving children the best start.
Intentions to transform mental health services.
